homepage.title: Your decentralized money pot
homepage.subtitle: Create, share, participate securely in a transparent and automated way

about_us.title: About us
about_us.description: Vital is a fully decentralized application allowing anyone to create a fundraising project for all types of needs: Wedding, birthday, retirement, medical support or simply for common expenses. Built on the Elrond blockchain, Vital is fully governed by Smart Contracts that provide transparency and security for our users.Our business model allows us to let you spend your money pot for free by spending it with one of our partners or by participating in our staking program.

step1.title: Create
step1.description: Create & personalize your money pot in just a few clicks

step2.title: Share
step2.description: Easily share your money pot with friends via Email, Twitter, Facebook or WhatsApp

step3.title: Collect
step3.description: Collect & manage funds securely, watch your money pot grow with each contribution!

step4.title: Give
step4.description: Spend your money pot with our partners, gift it to your lucky friend or request a transaction to your own wallet.

personnal_project.title: Personnal projects
personnal_project.description: Create your money pot for all types of needs: Wedding, birthday, retirement, medical support or simply for common expenses. And invite your friends, family or entourage to participate in the simplest way

charitable_project.title: Charitable associations
charitable_project.description: Participate in the remarkable work of these associations defending forgotten causes of this world.All the associations present on Vital are certified, and all transactions are governed by Smart Contracts which ensure reliability, transparency and security.

birthday.title: Birthday
birthday.description: A birthday to celebrate ? Create a money pot for the common gift!

wedding.title: Wedding
wedding.description: Say no to the traditional list, Yes to the wedding money pot!

baby_shower.title: Baby shower
baby_shower.description: A happy event to celebrate? Create a money pot for the birth gift!

community.title: Community
community.description: Donations or contributions to collect? Create a money pot for your association!

animal.title: Animals
animal.description: Has your pet broken a leg? Create a money pot so that we accompany you!

health.title: Health
health.description: Whatever the health problem, help is always welcome!

weekend.title: Weekend getaway
weekend.description: A weekend with friends? Share the costs simply by creating your money pot!

common_expense.title: Common expenses
common_expense.description: Refunds between friends? Create a money pot to make your accounts!

connect_modal.learn: Learn How to setup a wallet

footer.title: Earn
footer.content: Stake your VITAL and earn up to 252% APY

project_detail.participants_content: persons participated in this project until now. You can be one of them by pressing „Participate” Button!

about.title: About
about.content:
Welcome to this common pot!
Here you can directly and in one click, participate in this common pot.

- Everyone contributes the amount they want.
- All payments are free of charge and secured by Smart Contract

If you do not have an EGLD to participate, you can create your own wallet or download Maiar app

how_it_work.title: Your decentralized money pot
how_it_work.subtitle: For all your gifts, projects and common expenses
how_it_work.sub_how_it_work: Vital allows you to simply collect money in 4 steps
how_it_work.sub_free: Create and personalize your money pot in just a few clicks
how_it_work.sub_simple: Create a personalized money pot in a few clicks and simply invite donors to participate
how_it_work.sub_secure: All personal data is protected and encrypted on the blockchain to ensure the most reliable service
how_it_work.sub_no_creation_fees: The creation of your VitalFund is completely free.
how_it_work.sub_no_participation_fees: Registration of a participation is free for all participants.
how_it_work.sub_no_volatility: Our Smart Contract secures the funds in USDC stable coin to ensure an identical amount throughout the process.
how_it_work.how_spend_pot: How do I spend my money pot?
how_it_work.sub_recovery_in_vital: A unique commision that will allow to buy and burn VITAL in order to participate in the deflationary economic model of VITAL
how_it_work.sub1_recovery_in_usdc: A decreasing commission depending on the amount collected:
how_it_work.sub1_offer_pot: Offer the money pot to its beneficiary so that he can spend it as he wished:
how_it_work.sub2_offer_pot: with one of our partners or by requesting a withdrawal on his wallet
how_it_work.anytime_withdraw: You can withdraw your money pot at any time, entirely or partially, according to your wishes.
